Text: Awesome. I was a talent extra in this movie down in New Orleans. I am a Tarot card reader. I have been waiting forever for this. Thanks

THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!! This is an awesome movie. I did see  a scene that my husband is in at 50:06-50:35 He is the tarot card reader with the candle on his table. Also the street performer with the gold face makeup is a friend of mine Ursaline Burgundy. He has won several state & national drag competitions.
